short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random Quran verse on new tab - Malayalam, English and Urdu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to 'Ayat- Quran in your browser' , a go-to Chrome extension designed to enrich your browsing experience with meaningful reflections from the Quran. Every time you open a new tab, you're greeted with a random Quranic verse presented with translations to inspire, uplift, and provide spiritual nourishment.

Key Features:

-- Random Quranic Verses: Enjoy a new verse each time you open a tab, keeping your mind aligned with wisdom and peace.

-- Translations: Read the verses alongside translations in English, Malayalam, Urdu making it insightful for all users. (More Language coming soon)

--Customizable Translations: Choose which translation you want to see, with various respected translation options available.

-- Display Preferences: Tailor your experience by selecting what to display – the verse alone, or together with English and Malayalam translations.

--Display Settings Control: Customize your display settings with control over font style, size, and color to suit your personal preference and comfort.

--Daily Inspiration: Stay productive and spiritually grounded by having a piece of divine wisdom accompany your work and browsing activities.
Get Inspired, Stay Productive:

Whether you are a student, professional, or anyone who spends time browsing the web, 'Ayat- Quran in your browser' brings a slice of spirituality and mindfulness into your routine. It’s more than just an extension; it’s your companion for a heartening online experience.

Feedback & Support:

This is a weekend project. We value your thoughts and suggestions. Reach out to us for any feedback, issues, or requests at amjad@datahex.co. 

Your insights help us make  'Ayat- Quran in your browser'  even better for you.
